title: China Stocks Take GM, Ford on Rough Ride
text:
China Stocks Take GM, Ford on Rough Ride American auto makers are exposed to bad news overseas By Charley Grant Updated July 10, 2015 5:30 p.m. ET 
Athens’ problems don’t necessarily register in Detroit. But global economic uncertainty still adds to pressure on America’s auto makers to deliver at home. 
New passenger car sales in China fell 3.4% from a year earlier in June, according to data out Friday from the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers. Excluding holiday weeks, the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
